mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PRME' || LPAD(NVL(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(PRME_NO), 5)), 0) + 1, 4, '0') FROM PURCHASE_MEDICINE
INSERT INTO PURCHASE_MEDICINE(PRME_NO, PRME_DT, PRME_APPL, PRME_ATRL_FST, PRME_ATRL_SEC, PRME_ATRL_STAT) VALUES(#{prmeNo}, SYSDATE, #{prmeAppl}, #{prmeAtrlFst}, #{prmeAtrlSec}, 'PMST01')

SELECT MAX(PRME_NO) FROM PURCHASE_MEDICINE
INSERT INTO PURCHASE_MEDICINE_DETAIL(PRME_NO, MEDI_CD, PRME_QT, PRME_STDT) VALUES(#{prmeNo}, #{mediCd}, #{prmeQt}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRME_NO, P.PRME_DT, P.PRME_APPL, P.PRME_ATRL_FST, P.PRME_ATRL_SEC, P.PRME_ATRL_STAT, E1.EMP_NAME AS PRME_APPL_NAME, E2.EMP_NAME AS PRME_ATRL_FST_NAME, E3.EMP_NAME AS PRME_ATRL_SEC_NAME, PD.MEDI_CD, PD.PRME_QT, PD.PRME_STDT FROM PURCHASE_MEDICINE P JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON P.PRME_APPL = E1.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON P.PRME_ATRL_FST = E2.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E3 ON P.PRME_ATRL_SEC = E3.EMP_NO JOIN PURCHASE_MEDICINE_DETAIL PD ON P.PRME_NO = PD.PRME_NO ORDER BY PRME_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_MEDICINE SET PRME_ATRL_FST = #{prmeAtrlFst}, PRME_ATRL_STAT = 'PMST02' WHERE PRME_NO = #{prmeNo}
UPDATE PURCHASE_MEDICINE SET PRME_ATRL_SEC = #{prmeAtrlSec}, PRME_ATRL_STAT = 'PMST03' WHERE PRME_NO = #{prmeNo}
UPDATE PURCHASE_MEDICINE SET PRME_ATRL_FST = #{prmeAtrlFst}, PRME_ATRL_STAT = 'PMST04' WHERE PRME_NO = #{prmeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEDI_NM, PM.PRME_ATRL_STAT, TO_CHAR(PM.PRME_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS PRME_DT, SUM(PD.PRME_QT) AS PRME_QT FROM PURCHASE_MEDICINE_DETAIL PD JOIN MEDICINE M ON M.MEDI_CD = PD.MEDI_CD JOIN PURCHASE_MEDICINE PM ON PD.PRME_NO = PM.PRME_NO GROUP BY M.MEDI_NM, PM.PRME_ATRL_STAT, TO_CHAR(PM.PRME_DT, 'YYYY-MM')
